summary: This is an FBI 302 interview report of a Bureau of Prisons officer conducted on August 29, 2019, by SDNY AUSAs and OIG/FBI agents. The officer discusses the lack of specific training for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and suicide prevention, and describes the movement on the day of Jeffrey Epstein's death, noting he did not know Epstein at the time but knows of him now due to media coverage.

keyFacts: A Bureau of Prisons officer was interviewed on August 29, 2019, regarding the Special Housing Unit and Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The officer stated there is no specific training for the Special Housing Unit and he never received training on suicide prevention.
The officer described August 29, 2019, as a 'shower day' with significant movement involving 70-80 people in the SHU.
The officer indicated he did not know Jeffrey Epstein at the time but is now aware of him due to media coverage.
The interview was conducted by SDNY Assistant United States Attorneys and OIG/FBI agents at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York.
